description: React component 'Quiz' that fetches quiz questions from an API, manages user answers, displays questions with progress, and submits answers back to the backend. It includes navigation and loading/error handling.

methods.name: Quiz()
methods.description: Main React functional component that manages quiz state, fetches questions, and handles user interactions.

methods.name: selectAnswer
methods.description: Updates the answers state with the selected answer for a question.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next question unless on the last.

methods.name: back
methods.description: Returns to the previous question unless on the first.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Submits answers to the backend and navigates to the upload page with the result.
